summary: This document is a New York State criminal history repository inquiry result for an individual with NYSID number 1010612021, conducted on October 6, 2021. It indicates no criminal history, wanted information, or missing person information in NYS records, but includes a caution that identification is not fingerprint-based and suggests checking FBI records for potential federal history.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency issuing the criminal history report.

events.title: Criminal History Repository Inquiry
events.description: A criminal history check was performed for an individual with NYSID number 1010612021 through the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is a criminal history repository inquiry result showing no NYS criminal history for the individual with NYSID 1010612021.
It includes a caution that identification was not based on fingerprint comparison, indicating potential limitations in record matching.
The report notes that while no NYS history exists, the FBI may have records, suggesting the need for a separate federal check.
The document is marked for specific use only under federal law (Title 42 USC 3789g(b)) and must be destroyed after use.
